summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 7, Crane's Addition, being the alley from East John Street to East Thomas Street, between 17th Avenue North and 18th Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9476 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
